sections.heading: What is JavaScript?
content: JavaScript is a high-level, versatile programming language primarily used for enhancing web pages and applications with dynamic and interactive features.
It runs in the browser and allows developers to create rich user interfaces, control browser behavior, and manipulate HTML and CSS content on the fly.

sections.heading: ðŸ”¹ Why Learn JavaScript?
content: JavaScript is one of the core technologies of the web, along with HTML and CSS. It is a must-learn for any aspiring front-end or full-stack developer.
Its huge ecosystem, vibrant community, and widespread support across all modern platforms make it a powerful language to build robust, scalable, and interactive applications.
